name: Drone Flying Game
description:
Fly around the course, verse your friends, use powerups to beat them down.

ALT + F4 to close the game :)

Controls

--- Keyboard ---

W - Accelerate forward

S - Inertial dampener/Stop acceleration

A - Strafe left

D - Strafe right

Space - Strafe up

Shift - Strafe down

Mouse - Steer

--- Controller ---

Left stick - Steer

Right Stick - Strafe

Left Trigger - Inertial dampener/Stop acceleration

Right trigger - Accelerate

--- Credits ---

Used PUN 2  for networking - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/network/pun-2-free-119922

Low Poly City made by Broken Vector

- https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/roadways/low-poly-road-pac...

Drone model made by VoodooPlay

- https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/low-poly-combat-drone-82234
